jobs_results.title: Market Data Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

MORE ABOUT THIS JOB

YOUR IMPACT
The Market Data Business Analyst team at Goldman Sachs are responsible for coordinating with internal business teams on the selection of products and ongoing management of the Firm's market data spend with third party vendors. The team provide guidance to internal users on data services appropriate for specific roles, coordinate expense management initiatives and provide data analytics to enable users to manage costs effectively.
The role provides the opportunity to directly contribute to managing the firms operating costs by building data analytics and automated workflow that help end-users to manage their market data subscriptions effectively. You will be responsible for developing data collection, modelling and visualization analytics that correlate usage with user inventories. The role will provide the opportunity to partner with divisional management and business unit leadership teams to implement expense management initiatives... RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS

How Will You Fulfill Your Potential
• You will thrive in a work environment that requires strong problem solving skills and independent self-direction, coupled with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication
• Driving strategic initiatives and deliver key programs of work across Market Data and the broader division
• Your detailed knowledge of market data vendor products and an understanding of the Goldman Sachs business functions will enable you to formulate strategies to reduce operating expenses
• Building data analytics using popular storage and visualization technologies to empower market data users to manage their costs
• Interface with divisional leadership and front office users to implement expense management initiatives
• Continually evaluate the vendor landscape to identify new offerings that may increase value and efficiency for our employees who require access to market data

Basic Qualifications
• 2 years minimum experience in Market Data
• Python and SQL programming skills
• Experience of publishing and modeling data with distributed storage platforms such as Hadoop
• Experience with using visualization software (Tableau, Qlikview or equivalent)
• Japanese language

Preferred Qualifications
• FISD's Financial Information Associate certification
• Proficient use of tier 1 market data vendor desktop software
• General understanding of the capital markets
• Experience of the MDSL MDM inventory system

Job Description : MORE ABOUT THIS JOB YOUR IMPACT The Market Data Business Analyst team at Goldman Sachs are responsible for coordinating with internal business teams on the selection of products and ongoing management of the Firm's market data s

Experience: 2.00-5.00 Years

jobs_results.title: Business Analyst (Banking)
Compliance AML Risk Mgmt Sr Analyst - Assistant Vice President
jobs_results.company_name: Compliance AML Risk Mgmt Sr Analyst - Assistant Vice President
jobs_results.description:
The Compliance Anti Money Laundering Risk Management Senior Analyst is an intermediate level role responsible for recommending/establishing internal procedures to prevent money laundering and assist in all matters concerning financial crimes in coordination with the broader Anti-Money Laundering (AML) team. The overall objective is to utilize established disciplinary knowledge to identify inconsistencies in data or result and formulate strategic recommendations on policies, procedures, and practices.

Responsibilities:
• Identify, vet and address potential risks or escalated issues with the assistance of functional partners and key stakeholders
• Utilize information from regulatory changes, new regulations, and internal policy changes to further identify new key risk areas
• Analyze comparative data, prepare and present reports related to AML risk assessments, and monitor AML related issues and escalations
• Develop approaches/action plans to compliance and control issues by weighing... various alternatives and balancing potentially conflicting situations
• Create and develop AML Compliance Risk Management (ACRM) standards and policies
• Advise and recommend a plan of action for management based on analysis of risk information
• Assist in coaching and training new recruits
• Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.

Qualifications:
• 5-8 years of experience
• Anti-Money Laundering (AML) certification
• Knowledge of Anti-Money Laundering (AML) requirements applicable to banks
• Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication

Education:
• Bachelor’s Degree/University degree or equivalent experience

This job description provides a high-level review of the types of work performed. Other job-related duties may be assigned as required.

-------------------------------------------------

Job Family Group:
Compliance and Control

-------------------------------------------------

Job Family:
AML Compliance & Risk Mgmt

------------------------------------------------------

Time Type:
Full time

------------------------------------------------------

jobs_results.title: Technical Data Analyst – EDW Platform Specialist
jobs_results.description:
MANDATORY SKILLS:
• Excellent communication skills and ability to interact with internal & external stakeholders.
• Able to participate in requirement gathering by engaging SME’s & Technical team.
• Understanding on banking domain with experience working in IT banking projects.
• Experience in Application Platform Support – Release Management / DR Activities / Troubleshooting / Sizing / Security Setup / Housekeeping activities.
• Analytical skills to solve data mapping requirements for data ingestion from Structured & Unstructured data.
• Strong Understanding on Object Oriented / Functional Programming / Data Modelling concepts.
• Strong Understanding on Big Data Ecosystem - HDFS / Hadoop Ecosystem / Hive / Spark / Scala / Python
• Strong Understanding on Teradata FSLDM and GCFR framework.
• Strong Understanding on Informatica Toolkit with v10 & above.
• Experience in programming and optimization techniques of Teradata
• Knowledge of database structures, theories, principles, and... practices are desirable.
• Work in a fast paced environment, able to perform as an Individual Contributor and also able to manage his team delivery.
• Effectively deal with multiple deadline-driven, customer-sensitive projects and tasks
• Able to handle Client interfacing and manage internal & external stakeholders.
• Communicate clearly and concisely verbally and in writing.
• Strong understanding to concepts of SDLC methodologies like Waterfall & Agile.

DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Maintenance of EDW platform built on Teradata FSLDM and GCFR framework.
• Maintenance of Data Lake platform built on Big Data Ecosystem - HDFS / Hadoop Ecosystem / Hive / Spark / Scala / Python.
• Maintenance of ETL Application using Informatica Toolkit with v10 & above.
• Platform Support & Maintenance - Release Management / DR Activities / Troubleshooting / Sizing / Security Setup / Housekeeping activities.
• Flexibility to work for application support working environment.
• Preparing artefacts & presenting Functional requirement documents for User sign-off & acceptance.
• Contribute to practice initiatives: knowledge/IP asset creation

QUALIFICATION AND CERTIFICATION:
• Candidate should have 8+ years with IT projects and 5+ experience in Application Development / Maintenance & Support in Banking environment.
• Bachelors or Masters in Engineering or equivalent.

#LI-CTSAPAC

jobs_results.title: Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Reputable Government Organisation

Work Life Balance

Good Career Prospect and Learning Environment

Descriptions:
• Work with stakeholders to identify & understand the requirements of software systems
• Plan and participate in product conceptualisation sessions with stakeholders for eliciting requirements.
• Elicit and documents business/user requirements and translate them into user-stories for development.
• Manage requirements by continuously clarifying and reviewing them via walkthrough with stakeholders.
• Work with developers to interpret requirements leading to technical implementation.
• Analyse requirements to drive the design or review of test cases/business model/processes
• Work closely with Product Owner on project schedule, issues and escalation
• Work closely with Product Owner to manager business owners’ and project sponsor’s expectations
• Drive business process change requests on gaps identified and manage a project’s scope and acceptance.
• Provide inputs to... development team for implementation.
• Work with user experience designers (UXDs) and business users to plan for UAT, coordinates and monitor progress and acceptance of UAT.
• Ensures completion of documentations and filings to facilitate software development.
• Continuously finds means and ways to improve operations, streamline work processes and work cooperatively and jointly with various users' departments to provide quality service.
• Manage project scope and stakeholders’ expectations
• Issue escalation to the right people in timely manner
• Maintain and continuously refine Product Backlog
Requirements:
• Only Singaporeans
• Degree or Diploma in Computer Science, Computer or Electronics Engineering, Information Technology or related disciplines
• Min 3 years of business analyst experience in agile software development projects
• Experience with web-based and business process software systems implementation
• Experience with Agile project methodology (Scrum / Extreme Programming) and UX development environment will be an added advantage
• Experience with focus group and workshop facilitation will be an added advantage
• Experience with Confluence, Pivotal Tracker and Trello will be an added advantage
• Experience with BPM modelling techniques and methods will be an added advantage
• Certified Scrum Master or Certified Product Owner and/or Certified Business Analysis professional will be an added advantage
Interested applicants, please CLICK APPLY

jobs_results.title: Business Analyst/Senior Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Singtel, Asia's leading communications technology group, provides an extensive range of telecommunications and digital services to millions of consumers and businesses across Asia, Australia, Africa and the USA. With over 140 years of innovation behind us, we continue to push boundaries in our networks and services, to enrich lives and transform businesses.

Our core values - Customer Focus, Challenger Spirit, Teamwork, Integrity, and Personal Excellence - shape the way we work. We are passionate about making a difference and have an open and inclusive culture where everyone is empowered to do their best. Our diverse business means you will enjoy unique opportunities and rewarding experiences to learn and grow your career in a dynamic industry.

Join us and experience what it's like to be with an Employer of Choice*. Together, let's create a brighter digital future for all. *Awarded at the HR Fest Awards 2020

The Business Analysis (BA) team is responsible for gathering and... understanding the business needs, analyzing the business processes and supporting the design and development of the IT systems deployed across the organization. Business Analyst is a liaison between different stakeholders and acts as a connector by working closely with the domain experts and business users to identify business requirements, understand business challenges, address usability concerns, suggest improvements and document solutions.

As a member of the BA team, the Business Analyst/Senior Analyst supports the team members throughout the project life cycle, including supervision of the junior executives. He/she will aide in documenting both business requirements and comprehensive solutions for a number of low to medium risk projects.

Responsibilities
• Assist with daily management of operational functions of the project team and ensure that projects are delivered via a standard and consistent approach adopted throughout the BA team
• Participate in project walkthroughs, business requirements gathering, design phrases, functional test plans, user trainings and implementation sessions
• Lead requirements gathering, validation and verification via interviews, analysis, workshops etc, ensuring that requirements are complete, consistent, concise and verifiable
• Communicate effectively with business units to define system requirements and organization processes
• Review and prepare documentations and specifications in accordance with methodology
• Facilitate requirements prioritization based on business value
• Manage requirements traceability information and track requirements status throughout the project
• Manage changes to requirements through effective use of change control processes and tools
• Suggest areas for improvements along with possible solutions
• Lead internal teams and monitor progress periodically
• Assist in enforcement of project deadlines, schedules and methodologies

Key Performance Indicators:
• Clarity and accuracy of the documentations
• Feedbacks and comments from stakeholders and end users on communication skills, quality of documents and solutions delivery
• Team satisfaction on coordination skills, mentoring skills and delivery efficiency

Experience
• Degree/ Diploma in Computer Science, or a related discipline
• 3 - 7 years of relevant BA experience; Proven experience in participating in the full project SDLC/ Agile
• Microsoft applications, Visio Proven experience in the operation and analysis of database hardware, software, standards and data retrieval methodologies
• Excellent communication skills - able to communicate clearly and effectively in both verbal and written form
• Good analytical and critical thinking skills - able to analyze and solve problems. Ability to identify and document solutions with accuracy
• Strong business acumen - interest to learn and understand how a business achieves its goals and objectives
• Familiar with Agile Methodology

We believe in the strength of a vibrant, diverse and inclusive workforce where backgrounds, perspectives and life experiences of our people help us innovate and create strong connections with our customers. We strive to ensure all our people practices are non-discriminatory and provide a fair, performance-based work culture that is diverse, inclusive and collaborative.

Technology

jobs_results.title: AML Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Accion Labs is a global technology services firm with offering a full range of product life-cycle services in the emerging technology segment. This includes Web 2.0, Open Source, SaaS/Cloud, Mobility, IT Operations Management/ITSM, Big Data and traditional BI/DW.

Through nine global offices and a rapid-response delivery model, Accion offers a range of engagement models such as turn-key projects, extended-teams, shared-IP development, offshore-leveraged engagements and professional staffing (contract, contract-to-hire & direct perm).

Role: - Project Manager

Required

· Have managed large transformational Mainframe platform migration / re-hosting projects

· Understanding of Mainframe application related to infra needs

· Knowledge and understanding of UX / Linux

· Should have hands-on experience in projects

· Strong project management skills. PMP certification is an added advantage

· Have run a large complex project of at least 5m++

· Ability in managing and... handling 3P vendors providing application porting services and workload solutions services.

· Experience in contract administrations

· Ability in managing cross-country / regional / virtualization resources in projects

· Managing at CxO level customer

Job Description

Role: - AML Business Analyst
Job Description
• Minimum 5 years of relevant banking experience as a Business Analyst
• Knowledge in Database UNIX. Oracle DB knowledge required
• Mantas and Actimize Knowledge will be a plus. AML experience is required
• Logical and analytical thinking process.
• Experience in SIT, UAT Support, Cross sector engagements with other groups such as corporate banking.
• Ability to interact with cross functional teams and PMs, architects, regional and global stakeholders acroscountries and time zones
• Ability to write understand verify FRD BRD
• Experience in end user management skills
• Broad understanding of financial and technology services industries.
• Organized structured in approach.
• Focused on quality of output as well as the speed of delivery.
• Ability to work effectively in situations requiring analytical, interpretive, and problem solving techniques.
• Strong interpersonal and verbal written communication skills.
• Ability to work efficiently within team environments and as an individual contributor.
• An appreciation for the Technology Analyst role, customer service focus

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines

jobs_results.title: Business Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Roles and Responsibilities
1. Analyse the Agency’s needs, scope the problem and develop business case to address the problem
2. Document requirements, source and evaluate alternatives, and recommend solution that best fits the Agency’s needs
3. Work with vendor and app vendor on the solutions and design to seek clarification
and acceptance.
4. Work with users to ensure smooth deployment and adoption of new solution
5. Perform business analysis:
a. Identify stakeholders, techniques and processes to manage, track and trace
requirements
b. Refine and clarify business need, define solution scope and develop business case
c. Explore, identify and document business needs
d. Assess current state, analyse stated requirements of stakeholders and elaborate to
sufficient detail that accurately defines business need with in specified scope
e. Source and evaluate alternatives to identify solution that best fits business need,
identify gaps, and determine workarounds/changes to the solution. Assess... deployed
solutions to see how well they met the original need
f. Manage conflicts, issues and changes to ensure stakeholders and project team remain
in agreement on solution scope, communicate and manage expectations of
stakeholders
Knowledge and Skills
1. Tertiary Education in relevant fields is preferred
2. Hands-on experience in at least 1 full project development life cycles
3. Advantageous to have:
- Consulting or Business Analysis experience
- Business Analysis certification (Certification of Competency in Business Analysis™ (CCBA®), Certified Business Analysis Professional™ (CBAP®)).
- Up to date on product trends, best practices and technologies

- Knowledge of, and experience in one or more of the following areas is preferred:
- Web Content Management System (Sitecore) and Search Engine System
(Lucidworks Fusion).
- Knowledge of, and experience in data replication using Oracle Golden Gate, APIs and API technologies
(e.g. API builder – Axway, API gateways)
- Experience in government processes.
- Product and services related to Internet and web-based IT projects.
- Automated software testing.

4. Strong analytical, conceptualisation and problem solving skills
5. Ability to take a broad, strategic perspective as well as drill deep to understand business
needs and challenges
6. Results and customer oriented
7. Team player with strong organization and people handling skills
8. Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, with the ability to pitch ideas and
influence stakeholders
